p: Genes encoding IL-18-binding ( C12L), IL-1Î²- binding ( B16R), and CC-chemokine-binding ( A41L) proteins, as well as a Bcl-2-like protein ( A46R), were deleted from the VACV MVA strain genome [ 56]. The produced VACV variant with four deleted immunomodulatory genes resulted in a higher level of antiviral antibodies in rhesus monkeys compared to the initial VACV MVA.
